languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс молчит, не скрывая горечи на лице.{/n} "Мне... невыносимо тяжело признать это. Скаландр был истовым имперцем и прекрасным агентом... а хуже всего то, что момент, когда он перестал быть и тем, и другим, прошел мимо меня!" {n}Дознаватель прикрывает глаза — не то от стыда, не то от гнева.{/n} "Мне нечем оправдать свой проступок перед Золотым троном".

{n}Heinrix says nothing, making no attempt to hide the bitterness on his face.{/n} "Accepting that is... unbearable for me. Scalander was a true citizen of the Imperium and a fine agent... and the worst part is that the moment he ceased to be either passed beneath my notice!" {n}The Interrogator closes his eyes, whether in shame or anger, you cannot tell.{/n} "I have no excuse for my offence against the Golden Throne."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс молчит, не скрывая горечи на лице.{/n} "Мне... невыносимо тяжело признать это. languages.text: {n}Heinrix no dice nada, ni siquiera se esfuerza por disimular el pesar que nubla su rostro.{/n} «Aceptar eso me resulta... insoportable. Scalander era un ciudadano leal del Imperium y un agente extraordinario... ¡y lo peor de todo es que el momento en que dejó de ser ambas cosas me pasó totalmente inadvertido!». {n}El interrogador cierra los ojos; no sabes si por vergüenza o por ira.{/n} «No tengo excusa para mi afrenta contra el Trono Dorado».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing, making no attempt to hide the bitterness on his face.{/n} "Accepting that is... unbearable for me. Scalander was a true citizen of the Imperium and a fine agent... and the worst part is that the moment he ceased to be either passed beneath my notice!" {n}The Interrogator closes his eyes, whether in shame or anger, you cannot tell.{/n} "I have no excuse for my offence against the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix no dice nada, ni siquiera se esfuerza por disimular el pesar que nubla su rostro.{/n} «Aceptar eso me resulta... insoportable. Scalander era un ciudadano leal del Imperium y un agente extraordinario... ¡y lo peor de todo es que el momento en que dejó de ser ambas cosas me pasó totalmente inadvertido!». {n}El interrogador cierra los ojos; no sabes si por vergüenza o por ira.{/n} «No tengo excusa para mi afrenta contra el Trono Dorado».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは何も言わず、苦虫を嚙み潰したような表情を浮かべた。{/n}「それは…大変残念だ。スカランダーは真の帝国民で、素晴らしいエージェントだった…俺が彼の変化に気づかなかったことが何よりも最悪だ！」{n}羞恥心か怒りからか、インテロゲイターは目を閉じた。{/n}「俺は黄金の玉座に背いた。弁解の余地もない」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing, making no attempt to hide the bitterness on his face.{/n} "Accepting that is... unbearable for me. Scalander was a true citizen of the Imperium and a fine agent... and the worst part is that the moment he ceased to be either passed beneath my notice!" {n}The Interrogator closes his eyes, whether in shame or anger, you cannot tell.{/n} "I have no excuse for my offence against the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは何も言わず、苦虫を嚙み潰したような表情を浮かべた。{/n}「それは…大変残念だ。スカランダーは真の帝国民で、素晴らしいエージェントだった…俺が彼の変化に気づかなかったことが何よりも最悪だ！」{n}羞恥心か怒りからか、インテロゲイターは目を閉じた。{/n}「俺は黄金の玉座に背いた。弁解の余地もない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希一言不发，脸上的痛苦表露无疑。{/n}“对我来说，这个事实……很难接受。斯卡兰德曾是位真正的帝国公民，是位优秀的特工……这件事情最糟糕的地方在于，他就在我眼皮底下变了节，可我却丝毫没有留意到！”{n}海因里希闭上眼睛，不知是出于羞愧还是愤怒。{/n}“这是我对黄金王座的失职，我没有任何借口。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing, making no attempt to hide the bitterness on his face.{/n} "Accepting that is... unbearable for me. Scalander was a true citizen of the Imperium and a fine agent... and the worst part is that the moment he ceased to be either passed beneath my notice!" {n}The Interrogator closes his eyes, whether in shame or anger, you cannot tell.{/n} "I have no excuse for my offence against the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希一言不发，脸上的痛苦表露无疑。{/n}“对我来说，这个事实……很难接受。斯卡兰德曾是位真正的帝国公民，是位优秀的特工……这件事情最糟糕的地方在于，他就在我眼皮底下变了节，可我却丝毫没有留意到！”{n}海因里希闭上眼睛，不知是出于羞愧还是愤怒。{/n}“这是我对黄金王座的失职，我没有任何借口。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ne dit rien et ne tente même pas de cacher son amertume.{/n} « Accepter ce fait m'est... intolérable. Scalander était un authentique citoyen de l'Imperium et un excellent agent... Le pire, c'est que je n'ai pas su voir le moment où il a cessé de l'être ! » {n}L'interrogateur ferme les yeux sans que vous pussiez dire si c'est de honte ou de colère.{/n} « Je n'ai aucune excuse pour justifier ma faute à l'encontre du Trône d'Or. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing, making no attempt to hide the bitterness on his face.{/n} "Accepting that is... unbearable for me. Scalander was a true citizen of the Imperium and a fine agent... and the worst part is that the moment he ceased to be either passed beneath my notice!" {n}The Interrogator closes his eyes, whether in shame or anger, you cannot tell.{/n} "I have no excuse for my offence against the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ne dit rien et ne tente même pas de cacher son amertume.{/n} « Accepter ce fait m'est... intolérable. Scalander était un authentique citoyen de l'Imperium et un excellent agent... Le pire, c'est que je n'ai pas su voir le moment où il a cessé de l'être ! » {n}L'interrogateur ferme les yeux sans que vous pussiez dire si c'est de honte ou de colère.{/n} « Je n'ai aucune excuse pour justifier ma faute à l'encontre du Trône d'Or. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sagt nichts und versucht nicht, die Verbitterung auf seiner Miene zu verbergen.{/n} "Das zu akzeptieren ist für mich ... unerträglich. Scalander war ein wahrer Bürger des Imperiums und ein guter Agent ... Und das Schlimmste ist: Ich habe den Augenblick verpasst, an dem er aufgehört hat, beides zu sein!" {n}Der Interrogator schließt die Augen. Du weißt nicht, ob aus Scham oder aus Zorn.{/n} "Ich habe keine Entschuldigung für mein Verbrechen am Goldenen Thron."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing, making no attempt to hide the bitterness on his face.{/n} "Accepting that is... unbearable for me. Scalander was a true citizen of the Imperium and a fine agent... and the worst part is that the moment he ceased to be either passed beneath my notice!" {n}The Interrogator closes his eyes, whether in shame or anger, you cannot tell.{/n} "I have no excuse for my offence against the Golden Throne."

Scalander war ein wahrer Bürger des Imperiums und ein guter Agent ... Und das Schlimmste ist: Ich habe den Augenblick verpasst, an dem er aufgehört hat, beides zu sein!" {n}Der Interrogator schließt die Augen. Du weißt nicht, ob aus Scham oder aus Zorn.{/n} "Ich habe keine Entschuldigung für mein Verbrechen am Goldenen Thron."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing, making no attempt to hide the bitterness on his face.{/n} "Accepting that is... unbearable for me. Scalander was a true citizen of the Imperium and a fine agent... and the worst part is that the moment he ceased to be either passed beneath my notice!" {n}The Interrogator closes his eyes, whether in shame or anger, you cannot tell.{/n} "I have no excuse for my offence against the Golden Throne."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ne bir şey söylüyor ne de yüzündeki acıyı gizlemeye gerek duyuyor.{/n} "Bunu kabullenmek... Olur iş değil. Scalander, İmparatorluk'a bağlı... Hakiki bir hizmetkârdı. En kötüsü... Bu iki yoldan da saptığını fark edemedim!" {n}Sorgucu, gözlerini kapatıyor ancak utançtan mı öfkeden mi, anlayamıyorsun.{/n} "Altın Taht'a karşı işlediğim bu suçun bahanesi olamaz."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing, making no attempt to hide the bitterness on his face.{/n} "Accepting that is... unbearable for me. Scalander was a true citizen of the Imperium and a fine agent... and the worst part is that the moment he ceased to be either passed beneath my notice!" {n}The Interrogator closes his eyes, whether in shame or anger, you cannot tell.{/n} "I have no excuse for my offence against the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hiçbir şey söylemiyor. Yüzündeki acıyı gizlemeye de gerek duymuyor.{/n} "Bunu kabullenmek... Olur iş değil. Scalander, İmparatorluk'a bağlı... hakiki bir hizmetkârdı. En kötüsü... Bu iki yoldan da saptığını fark edemedim!" {n}Sorgucu, gözlerini kapatıyor. Utançtan mı öfkeden mi, anlayamıyorsun.{/n} "Altın Taht'a karşı işlediğim bu suçun bahanesi olamaz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
